website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a remarkably inexpensive bed bug protector should check out this affordable option from Linenspa.
pros: Offers various bed sizes along with pillowcase protectors
Quiet, soft materials offer shield from bed bugs, dust mites, and allergens
cons: Tends to warm up the bed – fabric not as cool as marketed

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for Bed Bug treatments- Seam Holes too big, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this encasement because I fear that I might have bed bugs in my mattress. But this product is nothing like how it is advertised, the seams have holes big enough for any bugs to crawl through (and yes I was handling the product with care when putting it on my mattress). There are a lot of reviews that have said the same thing, that the quality of this product is very poor. I do not recommend this product and I am disappointed with my order.
customer_reviews.author: yan878

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably strong
customer_reviews.text: I made an outdoor cushion for the orbital lounger on my dock. During a storm, the cushion blew off into the salt water. The cushion had to have been in the water for at least 10 hours and was still dry. It held up even though we found it about 20 docks away. I was very impressed with the strength. Of this product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great and have a guarantee
customer_reviews.text: We unfortunately dealt with a bed bug problem during the holiday's. We ordered the encasement's for a queen bed and pillows and a twin bed and pillow after we were treated with heat to kill the darn irritating bugs. They work great and have a guarantee. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: These definitely do what they say and keep the bugs ...
customer_reviews.text: These definitely do what they say and keep the bugs out and off your mattress the only downside is that they are still capable of nesting ON the fabric. We've had our covers since October and we started getting bit again about a month ago. We've treated and retreated everything multiple times till we picked up our box spring and found nests of them between the cover and frame. We are now working diligently to rid ourselves of them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous value
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many of these to protect mattresses in the past. Even with two people, they can be difficult to maneuver depending on the mattress. We have seen them tear easily and zipper failure is almost always a given. What a pleasant surprise at this price to receive this cover! Heavy enough plastic to 'give' and not tear, plenty of room for larger mattresses and zero zipper issues. We will definitely purchase this brand when needed.
customer_reviews.author: PAmela miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: LinenSpa mattress protectors are awesome. I have a couple of them, one on each bed and one on a fold out futon cushion. My daughter has spilled her bottle of milk on them, peed through her diapers on them, and my hubby spilled his Gatorade on them (even though I told him NOT to drink that in the bed!) and our mattresses have been saved each time! They don't make noise and you can't tell it is there. Will continue to buy this brand if our current protectors wear out I guess.
customer_reviews.author: KWalker17

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that really worked for bedbug relief
customer_reviews.text: We battled bedbugs in our house for at least 6 months before finally hearing from a professional that we needed to encase our mattress & boxsprings so whatever pests remained would be unable to feed. Apparently bedbugs can live up to 1 year without a meal (UGH) so we'll be keeping these on long term and will be the first thing we put on any new mattress or bedspring going forward forever.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Finished the extermination process!
customer_reviews.text: I was unbelievably lucky and got a literal 4 bug infestation. I was able to hunt and kill 3 of the bed bugs myself but I scared the 4th into the deep corners of my box spring. I put this on and the bites have vanished. Best of luck to anyone who's less fortunate than I!
customer_reviews.author: WI Eng

customer_reviews.title: Do not be afraid to buy this cover...it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary of buying a mattress cover because I was afraid it might be noisy or uncomfortable. It hasn't made any difference except now I can wipe the cover down weekly when I do my laundry. I love not having to worry about dust mites and such...and liked it so much I went and bought a second one for a family member!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart within weeks
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the sewing quality on this item is unacceptable. Within two weeks of putting it on a mattress, I found that one of the seams had just come apart. There was no undue wear and tear, nothing to cause this, apart from shoddy workmanship. Spend a few dollars extra and buy something that will actually last and is made to withstand normal movement of a mattress. An update here a long time later. The seller offered to replace the item but that never happened. So definitely avoid this item and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: NOT BED BUG PROOF
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after we noticed a couple of bed bugs after our move. We hired an exterminator to spray the house and then we put the clean mattress/box spring encasements over it and within 2 weeks we started getting bitten again. When I flipped the mattress and box spring there were little holes all over the place that weren’t there previously, as well as a live bed bug next to one of the holes. So it is NOT bed bug proof as advertised, since they were able to chew their way out of the encasement
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my dorm apartment, mind you I did not have bed bugs bit this GAVE ME BED BUGS!!! Within the first 15 minutes of me putting this sheet on my mattress I saw the first one crawling around. I immediately bagged the item back in its bag and put it in a trash bag. I believe someone who had bed bugs returned this product and then sent it off to me. I'M SO PISSED OFF. Now I have to deal with this mess. I'm so UPSET and FRUSTRATED. I pray that there wasn't more. I should sue for this nastiness but I just want this situation out my life and will be returning this junk ASAP!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashpreet Singh

customer_reviews.title: Bugs came with the box spring cover!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! I read the reviews and thought I would chance it!!! The package came opened with bugs on the sheets!!! I had to wrap it up in plastic and pray to god that nothing infested my house! I sent it back immediately! This was the worst experience I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I found it hard to believe that this product would REALLY keep moisture out of the new mattress since it wasn't the typical loud plastic cover. Boy, was I wrong!! It is 100% waterproof and is quiet as can be while moving around in the bed. My five year old loves it so much more than the old one! Happy daughter, happy mom!! I would recommend to everyone! Especially those who are struggling through occasional bed wetting accidents with their little ones at night. It's machine washable and line dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Mother's Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: I really love these covers (I bought one for each bed in the house!). I thought we had bedbugs, which was a false alarm, but I'm very pleased with the covers so far! First, they aren't "platic-y" at all, so no crinkling sounds as you sleep or difficulty keeping the fitted sheet in place. Second, they are actually water impervious. We had our niece sleep over, and she's "mostly" potty-trained. There was an accident, but I was SO impressed--the mattress was completely protected! (Note: I did think the cover felt "wet" at first, but I wiped it with a paper, towel, and it was completely dry.)
customer_reviews.author: Vikki O.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my mattress safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is ACTUALLY waterproof - not just water resistant. I put my hand under it and put water on top of it, and not a drop seeped through. I do not have children or pets, but I eat and drink in bed and stained my old mattress beyond repair. When I finally invested in a new mattress, I decided to keep it pristine white. This protector wasn't nearly as hard to put on as I feared, even though my mattress is the maximum 12" it says it fits! It also doesn't feel I'm sleeping on a piece of plastic, and doesn't make rustling noises when I move, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fit over my queen size box spring perfectly. Easy to put on and take off on my own. Tip: make sure the zipper is closed completely. The zipper goes into a small pocket and it can be tricky to tell if it is closed all the way. It won't do you much good as bed bug protection if they can still get in and out! I don't have bed bugs, but there is a problem with them in my town currently. Closing off the box spring and mattress makes them easier to spot, especially against the white color of this box spring cover.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C Dubey

customer_reviews.title: easy to use...soft
customer_reviews.text: awesome product. light and smooth and soft. Easy to put on matress. I did it by myself. I bought three, one for each of my kids.We all have major allergies so this helps a lot. We love it!! Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: catclan

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Bird mites have been captured inside the covers and apparently have perished from lack of blood. We still haven't returned to that bedroom. We had a dying crow in our yard some months ago and repeat visits from its friends but no apparent repeat of the infestation and there were live ones in the box spring when we covered it.
customer_reviews.author: Cepheid

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful. Protects from accidents
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cover to protect a twin mattress while my DD is potty training. It's wonderful. Protects from accidents, doesn't mold or smell. Easy to clean and stays put thanks to the zipper. Best mattress cover I've purchased. Just bought another one to fit my son's bed and will probably get one for the guest room. I was worried that because it's plastic my kids would sweat but they do not. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GalyaPS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: better then expected... would recommend ... would buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: Dale...

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good. It was also delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the box spring cover on for about a month, but so far so good. It was also delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Superwoman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money. Hard to get on.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality for $25. It has a nice soft feel and no crinkley sound. Be prepared to break a sweat when putting it on the mattress though! The zipper is only on one end so you have to lift the whole mattress more-or-less to get it on. I included a photo of my old hypoallergenic mattress cover for comparison. That one cost me about $150. As you can see it has a super-tight fabric weave. It uses the tightness of the weave itself to block allergens whereas the LINENSPA uses a plastic "goretex" type membrane adhered to the fabric to block allergens. I have no idea which one is better. Just offering it for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress cover and even better value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good mattress cover and even better value for the money. Fits my queen size mattress nicely. You might need another person to help you maneuver and put the mattress cover on. The nice thing with this cover is that it is fully encased with a zipper. Don't buy those covers which don't fully cover your bed. The material is nice and soft. Would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr KP

customer_reviews.title: Good product choice
customer_reviews.text: These protectors are easy to slip on your box springs, and seem to be doing a great job of keeping the dust mite allergy at bay. It is as shown, quickly arrived, and a good price. I looked around and compared prices before ordering. I would recommend this for anyone that wants to encase their box springs and mattress for allergy reasons.
customer_reviews.author: BeverlyMK

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased...
customer_reviews.text: I have two fairly new (and expensive ) memory foam mattresses that were going to be in storage for approximately six months in uncontrolled climate conditions. I was very worried about moisture, bugs, mildew and odors. I purchased two of these in hopes they would protect the mattresses for the duration. After EIGHT months, the mattresses came out of storage. Because some of the fabric items stored along with the mattresses had a very musty smell, I was concerned the mattresses would have the same odor. However, they were in pristine condition! They had no musty smell, no stains, no bugs and no moisture. I could not be more happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: jjames

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in the Twin XL size. The zipper on one of the packages was busted. I noticed how the encasement rustled/crinkled when I pulled it out of the package and I knew that it would be noisy once we put it on the bed and slept on it. No thanks. I love Allerease encasements from Target, which are amazingly quiet, soft, and breathable (they don't make me sweat!), but Allerease doesn't sell Twin XL. Judging from Linenspa's description, I hoped their product would be comparable to Allerease, but Linenspa just isn't it. Disappointed in their false description of the product. Will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these mattress covers; one queen and two twin, for my children who occasionally wet the bed. They are thin, but I didn’t think anything of it at first because they seemed to just be lightweight. The first night my son had an accident in the queen sized bed, it soaked ALL the way through the cover and into the mattress. The description is completely inaccurate. I will be much more careful next time and test it first.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley D.

customer_reviews.title: Bugs get in through the zipper!
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof ..yes Good material ..yes Keeps bugs out.. no We’ve had this protect on for almost a year. Today we looked at the zipper and they get in and out through there. We’ve been battling these bed bugs for a year now and thought at least our mattress is protected but nope.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Garza

customer_reviews.title: Bird mites seem to be drawn to feather pillows.  Anyone with a feather pillow needs these pillow protectors
customer_reviews.text: They work, so far, as advertised and seem to work on Bird mites; my personal problem. The real test will be with new feather pillows encased in Linenspa. Bird mites seem to be drawn to feather pillows and hey are my favorite pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Cepheid

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my deaf cat decided to pee on my sons bed. I put this on and tested it with water and was super excited when after 10 min the water was still in a pool. Then the real test she peed on it again. Don’t know if it soaked through or not but the mattress still smelled like pee. So it may be water proof but not smell proof. It is also very hard to put on and zip the whole mattress in by yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Life happens, but you bought a waterproof bed encasement.
customer_reviews.text: I got this encasement because I adopted an 18 year old cat a few months ago, and he had a record of peeing on random things. I have since medicated the cat (he's on Prozac now- apparently he's anxious) BUT life happens, and I spilled a whole glass of water on my bed. I changed the sheets, and wiped off the encasement, and made my bed again. It works.
customer_reviews.author: aDORAblexplorer

customer_reviews.title: Great box spring cover.
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews on so many box spring covers and decided on this cover. I'm so glad I did my research. I love this box spring cover. It fit my box spring easily and you could see the box spring through the cover. My mattress and box spring are 2 different colors so I was very happy about the thickness of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Awful! High frequency noise from really cheap material, and not anything proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of time and money- sloppily stitched, awful fabric that makes a high frequency sound that makes my bones itch. There is no way this is waterproof, much less a barrier to anything else. Spend the extra money, there are a few others on here that actually work, but this one isnt one of them.
customer_reviews.author: amphibia

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Sleeping...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and easy to put on. Quiet sleeping - Highly recommend this product. Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Galgiani

customer_reviews.title: Hot and loud
customer_reviews.text: It’s waterproof but definitely better for kids. I’m sure it would protect against bedbugs but if you already have bedbugs the only way is to get rid of your mattress... this won’t solve the problem. I wanted just basic mattress protection and this was easy to put on by myself. However, it’s very loud, uncomfortable, and HOT. I woke up completely drenched in sweat after putting it on. There’s no way I can sleep on this, even just using a sheet or light blanket on top of me with the AC on. It’s like sleeping in a garbage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great Value/Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value/works great. I recently bought this same item again to replace an old one (same model), and found the mattress to be clean underneath even though the old cover had multiple pet stains in it. This is a waterproof fabric type that completely encloses the mattress. It helps my allergies as dust mites are sealed in/prevented, as well as keeping the mattress unsoiled. This works just as well as encasements I bought from a specialty allergy brand which cost 3x more. I can attest to the fact that this can be installed by one person, however would be way easier with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Kshopper

customer_reviews.title: Extremely thick and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This is thicker than most and breathable. These are well made and construction is good. It seems to hold up fabric wise. I bought these when my daughter's school called saying they had an outbreak. We spotted a few and I bought the spray and put powder down and haven't seen anything for a month. I bought some from Walmart but this seems better made. The other one started polling and this one has not had that issue this far. I would use it again. Thinking of buying some more.
customer_reviews.author: misty hamer

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I got this because we found a couple of bed bugs and after the exterminator came and sprayed the house I put this on to prevent bed bugs from getting into the bed in the future. Well there must have been a couple bed bugs left alive because we started getting bit again and I noticed little holes all over the encasements and a live bed bug sitting next to one of the holes. It is NOT BEDBUG PROOF like advertised, the bed bugs chew right through it with ease. It’s definitely not waterproof either so I wouldn’t get it for that purpose either. I wish I could return it but that would be gross, so I just tossed them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for a good price
customer_reviews.text: My roommate brought home bed bugs (hooray) and the pest control people told me to go get a cover for my mattress and I randomly decided this one. The price seems good and there weren't many bad reviews. It has been a few weeks and I don't have any bed bugs on my mattress (they had not gotten to my room let luckily) It was easy to put on and the zipper worked well. No complaints and I don't think I will have any
customer_reviews.author: LoisGregerson

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase we've made
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I inherited an older mattress and thus we needed something to help protect it. He suggested this and we bought it. I dunno who else out there has a king size mattress, and knows how heavy they are, but I'm glad he was there to help me. The product itself is EXTREMELY easy to put on: You just encase the mattress, pull the cover up all the way and zip it up tight. As for water resistance, we've accidentally spilled a few things in bed and the protector makes it look like no problem at all. Definitely, highly, recommended
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality for our vacation rental home. thanks for a quality item!
customer_reviews.author: kamalu

customer_reviews.title: Look for something better
customer_reviews.text: This product is really disappointing. We read the reviews, and we thought this was what we were looking for. However, it seems to fall short is several ways. First is the sound; the cover is quite noisy. Moving around, and getting in and out of bed creates a lot of noise. This is pretty annoying, bordering on intolerable. This is partly exacerbated by the fit of this cover. Our mattress is 13" thick, and this cover fits loose and sloppy. The last issue is the heat. After we switched to this mattress cover, heat became an issue. It's not very breathable, and we now keep our summer weight comforter on year round. Overall, pretty disappointed with this mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Purchasing it for the second time - Amazing product - Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is really amazing product to protect your expensive mattress. It protects the mattress from all sides. Easy to install and has a zip to completely seal the mattress to be protected from any bug and is completely waterproof. This fits the mattress perfectly not too tight no too lose. The only concern with the protector is it makes a little squishy sound when we sit or sleep on the bed. I would certainly buy this product again for any mattress I purchase in the future. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Avijit Jain

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Fit, But Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: It's way too big for my mattress, even though it is the right size. It's noisy, and it leaves lumps and wrinkles under the sheets. UPDATE: Linenspa was very helpful with assisting me in finding a replacement for the cover that I purchased. They were very helpful, and after it was determined that their covers are too deep for my mattress, they refunded my purchase, which was very generous!
customer_reviews.author: DanaM

customer_reviews.title: Linenspa vs Allerease - Allerease wins 1st impression rose!
customer_reviews.text: First impression on opening the package—Linenspa does not seem as well made as Allerease encasement. I really wanted Allerease twin XL but could not find in list, so I went with Linenspa because I needed it in a hurry. Linenspa appears to have a less durable zipper but time will tell. I gave other features an average rating for now since I have no experience with it. I was able to install by myself with little problem and it seems comfortable enough. But again, my first impression is that Allerease covers seem more durable. I like Allerease zipper closure better because of an extra little Velcro closure tab.
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection for matresses
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've gotten one of these when I first got the mattress. It doesn't stop all moisture from getting through and it's not going to last a long time from what I can tell. It's a lot thinner than I expected, Not sure what material it is but probably a polyester nylon something. It's breathable but doesn't need to be since you put a sheet on over it. I have had less allergies since putting it on the mattress. Overall it's a good product in my opinion. The zipper is kind of cheap but it says it has a 10 year warranty. Guess we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Scott Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Too BIG inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: The description is inaccurate. Description says for a mattress up to 12” deep BUT it’s way larger. I ordered this for a 12” mattress I didn’t want it up to 15” Or 20” deep because it’ll be lose and bunch up in the bed so I ordered this one. I’m so disappointed wish the description would’ve been accurate so it wouldn’t be a waste of time for me and now I have to ship this back Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: A top quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Got hit with bedbugs. Low infestation. Bites are not fun. Had a professional come in and get rid of them. He recognized the brand and make of this cover that I bought after the fact for future protection and he said that it was one of the best products of its kind on the market. He was a professional and didn't have a dog in the hunt so I really appreciated his vindication of my decisions to buy this product. The cover fits very easily onto or over your mattress. I place it around the mattress by myself and it was not difficult at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Vinyl. Very stretchy on sides, not sure sides will be waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually opaque, and slightly stretchy. Thin on the sides, and almost transparent - not sure they will be waterproof. Don't intend to spill so can't say if it is waterproof. I'm wondering whether it can prevent allergens being so thin and stretchy. Also, this seems like it would be hot to sleep on, as it is very plastic-like. Let's hope it gets the job done. Check in with me in four months...
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: After my recent move to Florida, I've noticed a few things, cheifly that in florida you can't keep bugs out of your house. So this lead me to buy protectors for my box spring and mattress, especially since I decided to nix my bed frame since my mattress/boxspring was already 22" high on its own, and secondly because the sugar ants are a constant. I can keep their numbers low with my pest control routine but they will never be eradicated complete. This cover is well made and files perfectly, fairly easy for one short person to put on by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Not Good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I bought a new mattress and I like to have them protected in case of emergencies. Right out of the package, I noticed that it is very cheap. There is no padding and the material is very thin. Analyzing the sticking and I noticed that there are many gaps in the stitching, which will definitely affect the ability to be waterproof and bug proof, as the zipper is not covered as well. I'm keeping it as I don't like the process for returns, but if I had the knowledge prior to purchasing, I would've spent the extra twenty bucks to get a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Great, total encasement mattress protector with zipper. Completely waterproof, goes on like a jiffy, zippered fit, perfectly aligned/snug. Fabric is VERY SOFT and not crinkly/audible at all. Highly recommend as a standard product that should come along with your new mattress purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Analytical VTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not purchased for waterproof feature
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for bug proofing so I don't know or care about the waterproof aspects. I just know they did the job, were easy to put on the mattresses, box springs and pillows. I was concerned about them making me too warm as many folks suggested but that has not been a issue at all. I tend to be very warm and always looking for a 'cool' spot in the bed but these covers have not increased that need at all. Good, tight seams and zipped closure points. It has been about a month since they have been on our bed and we are very, very pleased. Sorry that I don't know how well they waterproof the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Habbick

customer_reviews.title: Using for more than a year now
customer_reviews.text: This bed cover was purchased in conjunction with a new mattress last year 2018. We have now been using the cover under the fitted sheet for the last year now and I am ready to write a review. I tend to sweat a lot while sleeping and this has done the job to protect the mattress. We wash the protector every month or so and Dry it on low heat. The last few drier cycles I have noticed that the material seems to be melting. I think the product is reaching the end of it’s life here shortly. But for the money it’s good protection. I will buy another when I throw this away.
customer_reviews.author: Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Updated: The cover is bigger and loose for the box spring. Initially I thought it would not be any problem. But after 4 months bugs are back again And guess what they infested on the folds. If the cover fitted peefectly then bed bugs would not be able to infest. So I am really dissapointed. Initial review:So far so good. No bed bug bite since using it.
customer_reviews.author: Anoy

customer_reviews.title: Pillow cases don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: It's made of a plastic material which inflates and then deflates when you lean against it. The worst is that the pillow case slips right off. It's definitely waterproof because it's plastic but it's seriously annoying that there isn't a way to keep pillow cases in place. As soon as I can I will be buying cloth protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy E'lan

customer_reviews.title: Great for bedbug entrapment, protection and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I found this great for bedbug relief. I used my first cover 4 years ago when we had a terrible bought with bedbugs saw the reviews and used as entrapment along with powders spray and steams. It’s comfortable durable and water proof. I just bought a replacement when I accidentally ripped the the old one while moving my mattress off the bed and it was caught on a loose nail on the wall. I’ve read a few of these reviews and must say it’s worked for me for at least 4 years. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: shena07

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: The encasement had a open hole in the one of the corners. I didn't realice it until it was already on. Since it was difficult to get the spring box in, I didnt bother. very cheapley made, I am sure I will need a new one very soon.but i won't be this brand
customer_reviews.author: sunnybeverlyhills

customer_reviews.title: This cover DOES affect how the mattress sleeps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover because one of my cats is getting older and occasionally has accidents. I have seen 5 sided covers that slip and slide around so though total encasement would be better since it would be form fitting. This thing sleeps warm and traps so much air that sitting on the bed puffs up the rest of the bedding and it takes a considerable amount of time for my memory foam mattress to recover from the vacuum left when standing. I'm going to try a 5 sided of a different brand hoping the extra air flow will solve both of my issues.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shashinka

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these mattress protectors for my elderly mother's mattress. I was impressed with the feel of the material and the fact that it was not noisy and fit that mattress so well. When my 3 year old granddaughter started spending the night with us I then purchased this mattress protector for the bed she would sleep in. Have not had a reason to find out if they are water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: The product seems to work great - my dust allergy symptoms were greatly reduced within ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very quickly. The product seems to work great - my dust allergy symptoms were greatly reduced within a week ( I bought both mattresses and pillow cover) Material is soft and noiseless.
customer_reviews.author: bex

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: We had a bed bug problem due to staying in a nice hotel. After having the bed sprayed we were told to get a mattress cover. This box spring cover was easy to install and did not rip when slid on the bed frame. The beg bugs have not been back.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: trying to get this on a queen mattress took over 2 hrs
customer_reviews.text: no matter how i twisted and turned this it always seemed to short or narrow or just did not fit. I needed someone else to help me put this on. Thankfully this is going to stay on forever, as i would rather sew my eyes shut then to attempt to put this on again
customer_reviews.author: Wayne DeJulia

customer_reviews.title: just as discribed
customer_reviews.text: I got this after watching a show that showed horrible hotel pillows. Plus horrible hotel pillowcases. I thought I would put this over it. I don't have room to take a whole pillow but I thought this can at least lock in any bad stuff their pillow they have in. I tried this on my pillow and it worked fine so I hope it works great for the hotel pillow. I just am not into getting lice or something from an unwashed pillow. yuck! I hope this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Rock Girl

customer_reviews.title: a rip can render this virtually useless.
customer_reviews.text: This protected me for a few months but then tore in two places where the bed frame was joined together. I think it was friction or maybe one time when I slid the box spring along the frame. Anyway, after months of being safe, I started being bit again and found bed bugs had nested in the wrinkles on the outside of the protector. Since bed bugs can live up to a year without feeding, a rip can render this virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: found out it IS NOT waterproof. My dog vomited on my bed and it bled right through into the mattress. Downgrading to 1 star. Bought to protect my mattress from my dogs. With a sheet over it, I can't even tell it's on there. Material is soft and not at all stiff. No rustling noises.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: SO NOISY!
customer_reviews.text: I’m SO DISAPPOINTED with this purchase! After reading the other reviews and doing my research, I was hopeful that this mattress protector would not be noisy — boy was I mislead! Will be returning it immediately. Definitely effected the temperature of my mattress as well. I have the brand new Tempur-Pedic Adapt Luxe which sleeps nice and cool, and this protector blocked that immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This works great. You will notice a SLIGHT rustle when you toss and turn but it is VERY slight. I notice that it does not breath (which makes sense), but I also put it OVER my mattress pad which explains why. I only have one sheet between it and me. I have a queen with mattress topper on both sides (really tall) and this fit like a glove. I will take the SLIGHT rustle over mattress stains from sweating, body oils, bloody noses, water breaking, drooling, developing bladders, developing bowels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: lordmattbob

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: So I agree with water proof, hypoallergenic although not tested. I gave this 2 star because I cannot stand the sound and the texture. I am the type that feel of the bed should be soft and quiet. This is more like vinyl texture, I don't know what its made of. I am returning this. Fully encasing the mattress for protection and easy install is actually good thing about this cover. So please consider this. Only reason i am returning this is because of the sound it makes when I move around on the bed and feel of it. If you do not think these two are not important, this is definitely full of pros.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Yi

customer_reviews.title: Protects mattress and virginity
customer_reviews.text: There are two kinds of mattress protectors: one of them is a lightweight fabric that doesn't make any noise when you touch it, and it says "I'm an adult and I take care of my things;" while the other makes your mattress crinkly and it says, "don't sleep with me because I will wet the bed, maybe on purpose." This mattress protector is the latter. I'm really sad I waited two months to put the cover on because I missed the return window - definitely would not have paid $25 to ruin my bed if I knew.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Potentially not the easiest for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Application was easy for me as I have a 7inch foam mattress. If you have a thicker/heavier mattress you may need two people since this opens at one end (like a duvet cover). I bought this to protect my mattress against dust as it is on the floor. However, if you are wanting to use this as your only means of mattress protection, I would suggest getting a protector where the entire top zips off, that way removal for washing will be easier rather than having to move the entire mattress every time you take it off. Also- make sure to measure the height of your mattress to be sure these dimensions work- especially if you have a mattress enhancer/topper!
customer_reviews.author: Reed Jara

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Bed Encasement
customer_reviews.text: We received the Linenspa Waterproof Encasement and I was able to install it on our bed myself. We have a king-sized Tempurpedic mattress that's probably about 10 or 11 yrs old. It really went on without a problem and looks nice. We haven't had any bedbug problems, but with a mattress of this age I'm sure there are dust mites. When you think of a waterproof encasement I was concerned that it would be plastic feeling and noisy, but it has a nice fabric feel to it and isn't noisy at all. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: My littles like to sleep in bed with us. One of them is potty training. Bought this so we souldnt have to deep scrub our mattress if he has an accident. Works wonderfully doesn't make that plasticky sound when you lay on it. It's actually really quiet and comfy to lay on. My husband and I are happy with this purchase. I do highly recommend doing your best to make sure you get the air out of the bag before you zip it or you'll be laying on a balloon lol.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is advertised as being waterproof. It is NOT water proof at all. My son wet the bed and it went straight through to the mattress, even though there is also a mattress pad cover on as well. I do not recommend this mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: krack

customer_reviews.title: What they don't tell you about is the noise
customer_reviews.text: So, my hard lesson learned from this mattress cover is that if it doesn't advertise itself as quite, it will be SO LOUD. Moving around on this thing sounds like I'm rolling around on a pile of diapers. I didn't know a material could be so loud. It's loud even under my top sheets! If either my partner or I move around a bit or get out of bed, the other one wakes up every time. Unusable as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dante T.

customer_reviews.title: Tight weave and easy to put on my box springs
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any need to test for water resistance, but they are easy to install and the knit was very tight on these. Our new box springs were shorter than the size that was listed that would fit in these, and they slipped right on with no problem. I was able to snag a set from the Warehouse deals for under $10, but I would have paid more. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TiedInKnots

customer_reviews.title: NOT beg bug proof
customer_reviews.text: Was deciding between this protector and another this one seemed like it would fit better but didn’t have the Velcro zipper cover like the other so I was hesitant until I read in the questions that it was a secure zipper that overlapped when closed. Then I received this and it had a broken zipper. You could zip this up and literally, pull the zipper open like a bag of chips (Just by gently tugging) NOT bed bug proof, which was my only concern. This is my second mattress protector I’ve had to send back and now have to wait even longer for a new one. Should have gone with my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: These work great! I bought one for my bed and one ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I bought one for my bed and one for my daughter. My daughter peed in her bed the other night. She peed so much and it did a great job at protecting her mattress. However, the mattress did have a slight pee smell and a little damp to touch but overall, it did a great job considering the amount of pee... The only thing I don't like about these bed covers is that they are a pain to wash (but that might just be any brand).
customer_reviews.author: breianna brindley

customer_reviews.title: Works for pet pee!
customer_reviews.text: Went though the ultimate test when our dog peed on our bed and the urine was sitting there for 12 hours, unknown to us. Sheets were soaked, mattress protector had a big yellow circle on it, which come off with vinegar and water, and... Mattress underneath was clean and dry. Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah T

customer_reviews.title: Noise?  What noise??
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. Either my ears are destroyed from too many conerts and blasting the stereo... or other reviewers have the hearing of a bat. Or no sheet on top of their encasement. There is no crinkly noise coming from my mattress cover since i put a sheet on it. Speaking of mattress-this cover is deep enough to fit my Ikea pillow top which is too thick for most ‘standard’ size sheet sets. Easy to slide on by one person and zipped up with no problem. Definitely will get this brand for the other beds in my house.
customer_reviews.author: sara jayne

customer_reviews.title: Good zippered cover
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put on, but once it’s on it fits awesome. Needed these for my dust mite allergy. Not sure if I notice a difference though, but at least I know their not getting in the mattress with this cover on it. Haven’t spilled anything on it, so I can’t really say anything about the waterproof part. Seems durable enough. Allergist recommended them for my dust mite allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Matney

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to put on and the thickness of the material ...
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put on and the thickness of the material was impressive. It was not thin and plastic feeling like others that I have purchased over the years. I would recommend this product and would purchase again. I did put tape over the end of the zipper just for the added security of knowing It was 100% sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jean

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old's bed to protect the mattress from accidents. Unfortunately, her pull up leaked urine all over the place the other day. When we removed the cover, the mattress was wet. There is now a strong urine smell. I figured it was too good to be true that something made out of cloth could be water proof. Don't buy this if you want to protect your mattress from a bed wetter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ecole else where to purchase like a Home Depot or a Menards
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the encasement for my queen size mattress if I was lying in bed I kept smelling a strange odor I got up and looked around in my house to see if anything I got back in bed I kept smelling a strange odor so I came to realize that it was my mattress encasement that had the older was afraid to sleep in my bed that night not knowing why it smells so awful had to spray it with Lysol not particularly happy with this mattress encasement had no instructions with Y8 hirai look Soldier near generic was definitely a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works well
customer_reviews.text: no Dirty Dancing here (bah dum dum), this encasement has met my expectations, and even exceeded them a little bit. It could be a little more fitting to the mattress, it is a bit loose oh, and I would rather not have to deal with it, but it is something I am able to work around. It is quiet, and soft. It does not make ice warmer through the night. I don't believe it helps to cool us either. I think it's a non-issue either way.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Nichols

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I bought a king, it is not waterproof. Had grandkids and there was an accident, soaked through to brand new mattress. So disappointed to know the waterproof claim was garbage! Also bought a Twin XL for a pillowtop mattress and it was too big. Since the dogs sleep on the twin, they easily destroyed it with their digging and it was never waterproof either. SAVE YOUR MONEY. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaB

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my daughter's mattress as she is 3 and still has accidents from time to time. The problem is that it doesn't always work. Her mattress has still become saturated several times. Secondly, the cover is difficult to take on and off. The zippered opening is only at one end which means the mattress has to be maneuvered so that it can slide into the opening (the same way you'd put on a pillow case). Overall, not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was great until the second time I tried taking it off to wash it. The zipper jams up and your forced to use pliers to try to remove it. That obviously doesn’t go well and your forced to either never zip it properly or buy another.
customer_reviews.author: StangBanger

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. This is awful.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. It’s thin and doesn’t fit the mattress well which makes it loose. The zippers are flimsy and The stitching is also cheap and already pulling apart. Not sure this will last longer than a month
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Love it, would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.text: I like this protector. There’s no crinkle sounds associated with plastic based mattress protectors. So to your guest that may be using the bedroom they would not feel like there was a mattress protector on the mattress and from my perspective that’s the whole point. It should do I t’s job in the background so to speak. Fitted perfectly. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Christina NY

customer_reviews.title: Hot and Obnoxious
customer_reviews.text: Tried this out on my latex mattress. Well first off, it's hot. I don't usually sweat while sleeping but with this I did. It makes a obnoxious grocery bag like noise. It didn't fit very well. And good luck removing this thing after you've just spilled on it. Now I know you can soak up the mess first but it's unnecessary for it to be "pillow cased" in makes it difficult to remove. Junk don't buy. Will be returning. Also it would start to tear at the seam when trying to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely bed bug proof as we had a problem long ago that this along with some bed bug spray helped out. One and done situation. Kinda easy to get on. I helped my boyfriend do it because I saw the bugs and didn’t wanna go near it. But probably manageable to do by yourself. We’ve had it on for a few months, no wear and tear so far. The only thing was when we received it. There was some strings hanging off by the zipper... but it’s worked so far. Definitely takes the hassle/expense off buying a whole new bed though
customer_reviews.author: Steena

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This item is not waterproof. I purchased this for my 6yo's brand new twin memory foam mattress. I was cleaning his room and noticed he left a cup of milk near the headboard of his loft bed. The milk leaked through this waterproof cover, then clear through to mattress. The mattress itself now smells like spoiled milk. I have taken both the protection cover and the cover that came with the mattress off and washed it in baking soda. Both covers still have a faint smell, as does his mattress after scrubbing profusely. We may need to purchase a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cjs

customer_reviews.title: Durable and protects well. No sign of fabric degradation either.
customer_reviews.text: No mites or spills on my mattresses means this is doing the job. I'm more worried about spills than bugs but it's been going strong for a few years and hanging in there. No tears, no getting brittle or flaking away. Just quietly keeping bugs, dust and liquids away from the mattress. That means I don't freak out when an accident or rogue drink (that's not supposed to be out of the kitchen anyway) spills on a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting for the Nectar mattress
customer_reviews.text: I brought a new king size nectar mattress and wanted to protect it with a mattress protector that covers it from all sides and with a zipper since the one from nectar doesn’t protect the bottom. After researching awhile on Amazon, I decided to go with this protector. I’m not sure if it is because the nectar mattress is a bit smaller than other mattresses, but I found the protector to quite loose fitting. In the end, I just decided to just keep it so I don’t have to try to put another mattress protector on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson K.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protector!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new mattress that I bought and washed it and slipped it on the minute we set the mattress up. It was an easy set up and it's worked great. no issues with anything leaking through and I feel assured that the mattress is being kept up pretty well because it's covered. No worries of dust, bed bugs, anything getting on it.
customer_reviews.author: S Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Our mattress isn't as deep as this can potentially hold, it seems. Therefore, we do have a bit of billowing, which seems easy enough to quash by unzipping a bit and pressing down. Works really well as far as water resistance goes (with two children who have already spilled drinks, it's definitely worth the money). It's hard to judge 100% on hypoallergenic though as you would need more time to truly determine this, but it does seem to have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of upset when mattress arrived in a 1 ft square by 5 ft box, I thought oh no this is just a mattres pad. To my surprise when I opened it a placedit on the bed it just started growing in to a very nice looking mattress. It is very comfortable. The only issue I have with it is the sides have no fermness so if you reach out for something on the night stand and get too close to the edge it is going to dump your ass on the floor,but to its defense I am a 255 lb Rolly Polly. It is a over all good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer G Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not Bed Bug Proof
customer_reviews.text: Broken zipper. Also stitching around entire length of zipper will absolutely let in/out Bed Bugs. As another reviewers picture shows, the zipper stitching is not adequate enough for bug protection
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R Lopez

product_meta.title: Linenspa Zippered Waterproof, Dust Mite, Bed Bug Proof, King Size Hypoallergenic Breathable Protector, Mattress Encasement
feature_bullets: Thin, quiet waterproof barrier protects all six sides of the mattress from fluids and spills - vinyl free materials are safe for kids.
Machine washable encasement has a zippered closure for a comfortable secure fit on mattresses up to 12" deep
Fully encases your mattress with a smooth, lightweight fabric to form a reliable barrier against bed bugs, dust mites and allergens
Soft, breathable fabric creates a cooler, more comfortable sleep surface - no crinkling sound or plastic feel
King size mattress protector measures 78" x 80"; 10-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars13,606 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 10-year u. S. Warranty protects against manufacturer's defects.
